text:
Just when we thought we’d never see Dylan O’Brien at another comic-con ever again, he only goes and shows up for the last ever Teen Wolf panel.

The actor joined his cast mate Tyler Posey and the rest of the gang for the talk at the San Diego event, as they revelled in just how incredible the MTV series has been and what it means to him personally.

"It's nothing but emotional now that it's over," O'Brien said of it coming to an end.

"For me, this will always be such a special thing. This was my first part ever. I still remember getting the call from my manager that I got the part of Stiles. The fact that it's seven years later, it's just amazing.

“It's been a family and it will always be a family. I'll always miss this character and this show. It's sad. It makes me super-emotional. I'm getting shaky just talking about it right now."

Dylan was absent from the show when he went off to shoot the Maze Runner films, but after a serious accident on set he only returned for a few scenes in season 6A, though after his comic-con appearance we’re hoping for a whole lot more in season 6B.

While Tyler was equally as sad about the whole thing, tellins fans that it's even more emotional because they've grown up together.

“We were 18 when we got started on the show. We’re adults now. We’re grown-a** men and it’s really emotional for me,” Tyler said, on the verge of tears. “It’s hard to explain how close this show is to my heart and how close everyone here is to me. They make me happier and they saved my life.”

Catch up on all of the latest celeb news you need in your life right now >>>
title: Dylan O’Brien Makes Surprise Appearance At Comic-Con As Teen Wolf Cast Say An Emotional Goodbye

og.description: There wasn't a dry eye in the house as everyone's faves reminisced about the good old days...
